channel.title: Max players WITHOUT crash! please help
channel.description: okay this is the deal. I want to put the max players on my server without having it crash. I can change the number and everything... THEN when its full it will give the "world is full" Message... BUT when people mass click the login button THEN it goes crazy. And gives me some LONG string of error and crashes the server. So my question is... How can i make my max players and have it NOT crash when people mass click the login button?

item.title: Max players WITHOUT crash! please help
item.dc:creator: @Du_Thelduin Du Thelduin

that is soo fcuking easy,

juz limit the amount of player classes the playerHandler creates…

public Player players[250]; ??? or something like that

edit: i found it looks like this

public static final int maxPlayers = 500;
public static Player players[] = new Player[maxPlayers];

you make one, make a new class and declare the startup in server.java, ex:

LoginHandler l = new LoginHandler();

item.title: Max players WITHOUT crash! please help
item.dc:creator: @Ben_Sprinkle Ben Sprinkle
item.description:
@Ben_Sprinkle wrote:

i am working on a project that involves a new handler, it’s very neat
i plan on sharing when i am done, still working out kinks and errors

====
LoginHandler.java:

public class LoginHandler {
  public void handle() {
    // all login handle stuff here
  }
}

then in server.java find:

playerhandler =

in that section add

LoginHandler loginHandler = new LoginHandler();

and to use in client.java or something you would do like:

server.loginHandler.handle();

i think i’ll make a tutorial on this
or something along the lines of that, this is just an example on how to make new handlers for yall

Read full topic
